review: I do like the interface, however there seems to be some kind of buffering glitch, no matter what i am doing like watching Amazon Prime or HULU Plus or NETFLIX or listening to Pandora,  am experiencing constant hiccups. My ROKU XS does not do any of that. I like the variety and amount of gaming options there are, but there is no option to play offline. A little bit bigger remote with a QWERTY pad on the back would be greatly appreciated and keep all on screen text option in QWERTY fashion, which they are not. Overall, it's a little less than what i expected, just due to the buffering hiccup i am experiencing. Maybe an update will correct that in the future.
